plot: A cartoonist defies reality when he draws objects that become three-dimensional after he lifts them off his sketch pad.
title: The Enchanted Drawing
plot_es: A cartoonist defies reality when he draws objects that become three-dimensional after he lifts them off his sketch pad.
plot_en: A cartoonist defies reality when he draws objects that become three-dimensional after he lifts them off his sketch pad.
